dcterms:creator: K. Saleh
M. Hossny
S. Nahavandi
dcterms:description: A public dataset that provides a wide range of smartphone sensors (e.g., GPS, accelerometers) and even video recordings to distinguish between three driving behaviors; normal, aggressive, and drowsy using Long Term Short Memory (LSTM) and LSTM-Fully Convolutional Network.
dcterms:title: UAH-DriveSet

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: An open urban driving simulator used to collect time series data for training and testing driving behavior classification models under various conditions.
dcterms:title: CARLA Simulator
mls:task: Data generation for driving behavior classification
